steps.description: Start at Tech House, 4th Floor.
Walk away from the Finance Block.
Head toward the Student Center.
Proceed to Hall 5.
Take the stairs or elevator to the Second Floor.
Start at Tech House.
Head north from Tech House.
Turn left and walk a short distance.
Turn south and continue.
Take another left and walk a bit more.
Turn right and head straight to HR Department.
Begin at Tech House.
Head directly to the Finance Block.
Continue straight to the Assembly Point.
Proceed to Admin Block B.
Continue to Admin Block A.
Arrive at the Engineering Lab / GEGIS area.
Start at Tech House.
Head north from Tech House.
Turn left and walk a short distance.
Turn south and continue.
Take another left and walk a bit more.
Turn right, passing the HR Department.
Continue until you reach IEET. Go to the 2nd floor.
